community of crowd workers and our hope was that by exposing them to opinions of

with diabetes face which one has more fiber if I'm supposed to eat meals that
are higher on fiber should I go for the left one or the right one and again here
we expose them to how others answer that question as a way of promoting learning

make where your knowledge may be insufficient and where you need to improve it we could with and without

treants observing answers by others did just as well as receiving correctness
feedback from experts so it really helped to promote learning but when the

thing that promoted learning was explanations so neither correctness feedback nor observing others changed

macronutrients that have a systemic impact on blood glucose either mild or

foods most typically vegetables so these are the most common things most common

breakfasts reduce your carbs to be about one carb choice examples of one curve
